column5: The MNR is conducting a summer creel this summer on the lake. Our fish club would love to hear from you if you fished the lake and if you were creeled or not. Please give us the dates you fished and if you were creeled or not. email [email protected] Good fishing: Frank

Frank,I will be heading to LDML next week. Staying at Maki Bay. I will be happy to let you know anything about getting checked.Can you give me any pointers about the lake. Have only been there twice, done pretty well, but always looking to improve. Especially with a big Northern!Thanks in advance Willie
